This is a lil button kit with customizable minimum widths!


It uses a zero height frame within the button component to simulate a minimum width (shown by @Rogie in a recent Figma in 5).


Enjoy ^__^


Btw - this was streamed over at twitch.tv/aalexdee. Stop by sometime and join us while we design stuff live on the internet!
